records.name: Rivethi Beach

location.address: Lot No. 11070, Beach Front Kaani Magu Beach Road

descriptions.direction: Located in Hulhumal√©, Rivethi Beach hotel is in the city center and on the beach. While the natural beauty of Hulhumale Beach and Full Moon Beach can be enjoyed by anyone, those looking for an activity can check out Hulhumale Ferry Terminal. Maldives Islamic Centre and Male Fish Market are two other places to visit that come recommended. Discover the area's water adventures with scuba diving, snorkeling, and fishing nearby, or enjoy the great outdoors with hiking/biking trails.
descriptions.general: Stop at Rivethi Beach Hotel to discover the wonders of Male City and Airport. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, are at hand. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning can be found in selected guestrooms. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel`s recreational facilities, including diving, fishing, water sports (motorized), water sports (non-motorized). No matter what your reasons are for visiting Male City and Airport, Rivethi Beach Hotel will make you feel instantly at home. Guests over 12 years old are considered as adults.

records.short_description: Original hotel with 18 rooms, restaurant and bar

all_offers.room_name: Deluxe suite - Bed type subject to availability
